div.head: 產後敗血攻心
div.div: rotten blood attacking the heart following delivery

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Chan hou bai xue gong xin

entry.def: rotten blood attacking the heart following delivery

sense.def: Alternative Names chan hou bai xue ru xin 產後敗血入心 , rotten blood enters the heart following delivery; chan hou bai chong xin 產後敗血沖心 , rotten [blood] surging to the heart following delivery; yu xue qiang xin 余血搶心 , residual blood knocks the heart. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases with vexation and restlessness, distension and heart-pressure, or in severe cases even mental clouding and mad language as their major signs. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry jiang huang 薑黃：蜀人以治氣脹及產後敗血攻 心，甚驗 , “The Shu people use it for treating qi distension and rotten blood attacking the heart following delivery . It is very effective”.
